title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Nutrition
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Nutrition 

and Health Claims made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Nutrition and Health 
Claims made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 458 of 
2015), the European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims made on Foods) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 154 of 2017), the Regulations of 
2018, the European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims made on Foods) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 243 of 2021) and these Regulations 
may be cited together as the European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims 
made on Foods) Regulations 2014 to 2022.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: In these Regulations-
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations- 

“Principal Regulations” means European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims 
made on Foods) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 11 of 2014); 

“Regulations of 2018” means European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims 

made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 176 of 2018).

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations (as last amended by
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations (as last amended by 
Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2018) is amended by substituting for the 
definition of “list of permitted claims which may be made on foods, as 
provided for in Article 13(3) of EC Regulation 1924/2006” the following 
definition: 

“ ‘list of permitted claims which may be made on foods, as provided for 
in Article 13(3) of EC Regulation 1924/2006’ means the health claim in 
relation to water-soluble tomato concentrate which may be made on 
foods pursuant to the Annex to Commission Decision 2009/980/EU of 17 
December 20092 as amended by Commission Decision 2010/770/EU of 
13 December 20103 and the list of permitted health claims other than 
those referring to the reduction of disease risk and to children’s 
development and health, which may be made on foods pursuant to the 

1 OJ No. L 143, 27.4.2021, p. 8. 
2 OJ No. L 336, 18.12.2009, p. 55. 
3 OJ No. L 328, 14.12.2010, p. 18. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [689] 3 

Annex to Commission Regulation (EU) No. 432/2012 of 16 May 20124 
as amended by Commission Regulation (EU) No. 536/2013 of 11 June 
20135, Commission Regulation (EU) No. 851/2013 of 3 September 
20136, Commission Regulation (EU) No. 1018/2013 of 23 October 
20137, Commission Regulation (EU) No. 40/2014 of 17 January 20148, 
Commission Regulation (EU) 2015/7 of 6 January 20159, Commission 
Regulation (EU) 2015/539 of 31 March 201510, Commission Regulation

Regulation (EU) 2017/676 of 10 April 201715 and Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/686 of 23 April 20211;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 December, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give effect to Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2021/686 of 23 April 2021 which amends the Annex to Regulation (EU) No. 
432/2012. The latter Annex sets out the list of permitted health claims, other 
than those referring to the reduction of disease risk and to children’s 
development and health, which may be made on foods. Regulation (EU) 
2021/686 amends that Annex, by inserting into that list an entry for 
“carbohydrate solutions”. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims 
made on Foods) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 11 of 2014) in the manner 
specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Nutrition and Health 
Claims made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [689] 5
